revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Hardkernel |model=ODROID-XU |revision=3 (2GB) |price=179 |est_release_date=07/2014 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=Exynos 5422;(5 Octa); |cpu1_cspeed=1.4-2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=8 |fla1=0 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=PoP |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=6 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 1.8V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=SMSC |eth_chip1_model=LAN9514 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PMIC for 2.7-5.0V;Samsung;S2MPS11;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Audio Codec;Maxim Integrated;MAX98090;;1;,,, Bi-Directional Current Power Monitor w/ 1.8V I2C IF;TI;INA231;;1;,,, 4-Channel ESD Protection for High-Speed Data IF;TI;TPD4E001;;1;,,, 8-Channel ESD Protection for DisplayPort;TI;TPD8S009;;1;,,, 4-Channel ESD Protection for USB 3.0;TI;TPD4EUSB30;;1;,,, 2-Channel ESD Protection for USB 3.0;TI;TPD2EUSB30;;2;,,, 0.2A Single Channel Load Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2331;;1;,,, High-Side Power Switch for USB;Richtek;RT9715;;1;,,, Overvoltage Protection Circuit;ON Semi;NCP372;;2;,,, Power Distribution Switch;ON Semi;NCP380;;1;,,, HDMI ESD Protection;Nexperia;IP4791CZ12;;1;,,, UHS 2-Input AND Gate;Fairchild;NC7SZ08;;1;,,, UHS 2-Input OR Gate;Fairchild;NC7SZ32;;1; |flags=Micro HDMI 1.4a, DisplayPort, MicroSD Card slot, eMMC module connector, RTC w/ battery backup, Audio out (3.5mm), GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2012.07; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.58;Ubuntu 14.04.1; |tp_firmware=Arch Linux (Arm), Armbian |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=odroid |default_pass=odroid |oui_eth=00:1E:06 }} {{TagLine|Single Board Computer - ODROID-XU3}} :[https://www.hardkernel.com/shop/odroid-xu3/ Product page]
eMMC module connector for eMMC 5.0 HS400 Flash Storage modules of :8GB, 16GB and 32GB available. RAM is LPDDR3 PoP with processor.
Energy Monitor - Accurate current sensors and voltage sensors :are implemented on PCB for energy measurement.
===Links=== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://wiki.odroid.com/old_product/odroid-xu3/odroid-xu3 ''ODROID-XU3'' on '''ODROID''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2014/07/08/hardkernel-unveils-179-odroid-xu3-development-board-powered-by-samsung-exynos-5422-soc/ ''Hardkernel ODROID-XU3'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Samsung]] ''Exynos'' 5422 (5 Octa) :4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @2.0GHz + :4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.4GHz *GPU: ARM Mali-T628 MP6 @533MHz *Storage: SDHC Card slot, :eMMC 5.0 HS400 connector *RAM: 2GB LPDDR3 @933MHz
===See also=== *[[ODROID-C0]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1+]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C2]] - ''Amlogic'' S905 4-cores ARM Cortex-A53 CPU @2.0GHz *[[ODROID-GO]] - ''Espressif Systems'' ESP32 Dual Core LX6 @240MHz *[[ODROID-H2]] - ''Intel'' J4105 4-cores Celeron @2.5GHz *[[ODROID-HC1]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-HC2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-N2]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM Cortex-A73 @1.8GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM Cortex-A53 @1.9GHz CPU *[[ODROID-U2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-U3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-X]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.4GHz *[[ODROID-X2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-XU]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5410 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.6GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.2GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3 Lite]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.8GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU4]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU
